title: Arrive early and prepare
copy: Ben checks the rota, reviews priorities and allergen notes, and helps with opening tasks.
alt: Ben checking stock and preparing a store area
caption: Early prep avoids downstream rush.

title: Welcome and guide customers
copy: Greets with a smile, manages the queue and keeps things moving during busy periods.
alt: Ben serving at a coffee machine in a busy cafe
caption: Clear eye contact + quick cues reduce queue anxiety.

title: Confident on the till
copy: Handles EPOS basics, cash handling, refunds/exchanges, and Click & Collect pickups.
alt: Ben working behind a counter with a till
caption: Accuracy first; refunds escalated promptly.

title: Stay organised and proactive
copy: Keeps stock rotated and the area tidy, and uses checklists to track tasks.
alt: Ben using a computer to organise notes
caption: FIFO and tidy zones keep service flowing.

title: Close down and handover
copy: Restocks, cleans down, reconciles the float and shares notes for the next shift.
caption: Clear notes speed up next day's open.
